example.eg: Jane looked good in her tight jeans.
example.egtrans: 简穿着紧身牛仔裤很好看。

example.eg: Make sure the knot is really tight.
The cord is so tight that it doesn't move when you pull it.
example.egtrans: 绳子绷得很紧，拉也拉不动。

example.eg: The joint needs to be tight so the pipe doesn't leak.
example.egtrans: 连接处需要被密封，这样管道才不会泄漏。

example.eg: My calf muscles are tight from running too long this morning.
example.egtrans: 我今天早上跑步时间太长了，小腿肌肉很紧张。

example.eg: The trunk was packed tight for the trip.
example.egtrans: 为了这次旅行，后备箱被关得紧紧的。

example.eg: The short story had tight, precise sentences.
example.egtrans: 这个故事的词句紧凑、精炼。

example.eg: It was a bit chilly, so Linda put on a pair of tights under her skirt.
example.egtrans: 天气有点冷，所以琳达在裙子下穿了一条紧身裤。

example.eg: The footman wore tights below his breeches.
example.egtrans: 那个男仆在马裤下穿了连裤袜。

example.eg: Years of playing together have turned these musicians into a tight band.
example.egtrans: 这些音乐家共同演奏多年，配合非常默契。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 协调好的, 配合好的

example.eg: This jazz quartet has a tight sound.
example.egtrans: 爵士乐团演奏非常和谐。

example.eg: It was a tight situation with both of Dan's customers there at the same time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 凶险的, 难以应付的

example.eg: The dictator had tight control over his military.
example.egtrans: 独裁者对于他的军队有严格的管控。

example.eg: We were really tight in high school.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 关系密切的，亲密无间的

example.eg: The job market is tight right now.  You will be lucky to find something.
example.egtrans: 当前就业市场局势困难，如果你能找到工作的话实属幸运。

example.eg: The millionaire was so tight with his money that he didn't have a nice stereo.
example.egtrans: 那个百万富翁很抠门，以至于他家连个像样的立体声音响都没有。

example.eg: The businessmen went to the bar to get tight.
My client wants this job finished by Friday; it's going to be tight, but I think I can manage it.
example.egtrans: 客户需要这份工作在周五前完成。时间很紧张，不过我认为我能搞定。

example.eg: The samples should be stored in an airtight container.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 密封的, 密闭的, 不透气的

example.eg: The attorney presented an airtight argument and won the trial.
example.egtrans: 律师给出了无懈可击的论证，赢得了诉讼。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 严密的，无懈可击的，毫无破绽的

example.eg: The woman held her bag tight as she hurried along the dark street.
Tim held his girlfriend tight, before saying goodbye.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 紧紧拥抱, 紧紧抱住

example.eg: I'll be back in one moment - hold tight.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坚持住, 再坚持一会儿

example.eg: "Hold tight," shouted the ride operator as the rollercoaster began to move.
Hold tight, the next few months could prove to be a bumpy ride!
Stan usually turns to Larry for help when he is in a tight spot.
The girls were all wearing skin-tight shirts and short skirts.

dsense.name: tight-fisted, tightfisted
dsense.guideword: figurative, pejorative, informal (stingy, miserly) (非正式用语，比喻)

example.eg: This dress is still a tight fit, I'm afraid.
The plumber managed to connect the pipes, but it was a tight fit.
We can get our car into the garage, but it's a tight fit.
Melissa wears tight-fitting clothes hoping to attract attention.
A skilled carpenter makes joints so tight fitting that they're invisible.
The village is a tight-knit community.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 紧密的, 亲密的, 紧密结合的

example.eg: The government is remaining tight-lipped about its plans.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 守口如瓶的, 保守秘密的
